actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to extend the authorizations of appropriations contained in such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to authorize appropriations for the Appalachian Regional Commission and the Appalachian development highway system through fiscal year 1984.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to extend the authorizations of appropriations contained in such Act.
